title: Waste as an architectural resource: Anders Lendager, Lendager Group
itunes:title: Waste as an architectural resource: Anders Lendager, Lendager Group
description: Lendager Group is leading the conversation in Denmark around architectural upcycling – the practice of creating a product of higher value than the original. The firm takes a circular rather than linear view and uses creative solutions to connect the dots between building waste headed for landfills and new construction. Lendager sat down with DAC’s Jen Masengarb to discuss the firm’s latest work and the problems yet to be solved. Support for this podcast comes from Realdania.
